job_description:
About Phonic

The toolbox for customer research is flawed. Qualitative research doesn't scale, and quantitative research doesn't work. Phonic is a tool that aims to merge this dichotomy into a more powerful, unified industry. We're building the enterprise platform for voice and video research, allowing the largest research players in the world to scale the unscalable. Learn more about Phonic here.

As one of our first engineers, expect to

Architect, build, and own new product features from start to finish. Work directly with founders on roadmap and strategy. Shape direction through communicating with customers and gathering user feedback. Help us grow the team by interviewing and onboarding future engineers.

What we're looking for

Bachelor’s and/or Master’s degree, preferably in CS, or equivalent experience.
Strong coding skills in Python/Java/C++/Scala or equivalent for high performant production quality code.
Exposure to architectural patterns of a large, high-scale web application (e.g., well-designed APIs, high volume data pipelines, efficient algorithms).
Experience with best practices such as A/B testing, continuous integration.
Prior experience in machine learning is a plus.
Strong data analytics skill is a plus.
Empathetic & clear communicators.
3+ years software engineering experience.
Willing to quickly learn new frameworks/technologies and execute independently.
Familiar with Python, Flask/Django, Kafka/RabbitMQ, MongoDB, Docker.

Other Bonuses

Startup experience (founding or early)
Chess rating > 1800 ELO
Interest in a highly technical niche
